 Apocalypse looked at Magma when the comm from the
second in command on earth cyngar came on. "We should
at another time discuss the ranks of our new group
here. As long as I get to massacre bots im happy as a
clam." He bowed. He had a hundred million battle plans
in his head all lined up just waiting to be uncovered
and used to destroy the destron enemy. He was pumped.
--- Rudra656@... wrote:
> ::Cygnar::
>     He flew to the Sulaco behind Apocalypse.  He
> opened a com to Magmatron.  
> "This is second in command Cygnar requesting
> permission to enter.  It's good 
> to have you back sir."  He lands outside the base.
>
